episodes.title: The Narcosatanists | The Story of Cult Leader & Serial Killer Adolfo de Jesús Constanzo
episodes.description:
Discover the chilling story of cult leader and serial killer Adolfo de Jesús Constanzo in this true crime documantary about the Narcosatanists.

After Mark Kilroy vanished without a trace in Mexico, the search for him led authorities to the door of a drug Cartel harbouring a dark secret.

Led by a violent cult leader practicing dark magic rituals, the Cartel routinely carried out human sacrifice and horrific, disturbing occult rituals they believed led to the success of their drug empire.

This is the shocking true story of the Narcosatanists.
